#app1 (model/bind) example

Message: 

var app1 = new Exp({
    el: '#app1',
    data: {
        message: ''
    }
});

#app2 (model/bind/methods) example

Message: 

var app2 = new Exp({    
    el: '#app2',
    data: {
        message: ''
    },
    methods: {
        reverseMessage() {
            this.message = this.message.split('').reverse().join('');
        }
    }
});

#app3 (methods/if)

My message
var app3 = new Exp({
    el: '#app3',
    data: {
        visible: 
    },
    methods: {
        toggleMessage() {
            this.visible = (this.visible ? false : true);
        }
    }
});

#app4 (exp-for)

var app4 = new Exp({
    el: '#app4',
    data: {
        team: ["Lukas", "Adam", "Roman"]
    },
    methods: {
        showName(el) {
            var name = this[el.getAttribute("exp-parent")]
            alert(name);
        }
    }
});
